content: Greater Lafayette founders are invited to apply to spend one-on-one time with Paul Singh and other startup investors / advisors. Paul is the former Managing Director of 1776, Founder of Disruption Corporation, Partner at 500Startups, and Entrepreneur in Resident at USCIS / DHS. Startups selected to participate will have the opportunity to pitch and receive feedback during their sessions with Paul and his guest investors. Everything shared in this conference room stays in the room.
